title: Sparkle ( GameHouse )
description:
Free the Crowberry Woods from the shadow of Darkness.

Use your Orb Slinger to shoot colored spheres into groups of three or more and reclaim every corner of this once vibrant forest. Discover amazing amulets and glittering power-ups hidden along the shaded path. Featuring three game modes and loads of intriguing levels, Sparkle is fast, colorful, and full of addictive fun!

Game details:

* Three Game Modes: Quest, Challenge, and Survival
* Powerful Amulets to Collect
* Innovative Power-Ups
* Gorgeous Full-Screen Graphics

System Requirements

- Windows Vista/Windows 98/Windows ME/Windows XP/Windows 2000
- 500 MHz Pentium 3 or equivalent
- 64MB RAM
- DirectX 5.0
